name: uniquely
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is unusual or special in some way: He's uniquely qualified to run this agency. Antarctica is uniquely suited for many types of research. See
unique
More examplesFewer examplesHis claims came at a uniquely sensitive moment.The town is uniquely situated between two glacial lakes and is surrounded by natural beauty. Uniquely, a week of the rehearsal period was spent at the film studios.
